attributes.action: Prevent MP's cashing in on Housing Allowances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most MP's get large housing benefits with which they buy London properties, and sell for hefty profits when they quit, or are voted out. 
Parliament should provide propertys, or take leases for MPs, so that when they leave there is no financial gain for them - they are getting rich at the publics expense.
This scheme would retain any profit in public ownership, rather than in the MP's pockets.
